description: Summary of Feedback can only be accessed and downloaded when logged into your SAP Aribra account and you have filled out your Government of Canada profile...
full_summary:
### Government of Canada Tender Announcement
#### ID: WS4201861174
#### Title: Summary of Feedback
#### Posted: June 10, 2024
#### Closing Date: June 18, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT
#### Description:

The Government of Canada Department of Public Works and Government Services is soliciting bids for relocation services in accordance with the specifications outlined in the tender document. In order to participate in this request, please visit the Government of Canada's online procurement platform and login to your SAP Ariba account.

Once logged in, you will need to complete a few mandatory fields to view and respond to the request. For new users, it is recommended that you consult the CanadaBuys Getting Started page for tutorials and guides to assist in creating a new account.

The contract is expected to begin on January 8, 2024, with no anticipated end date. The UN/SPSC code for this tender is 78101804, indicating relocation services.

Those seeking technical support for SAP Ariba can contact the CanadaBuys Service Desk agents at the link provided. Please be advised that all potential bidders must be registered with the Government of Canada before proceeding with this request.

#### Important Details
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User:** Treasury Board (TBS)
* **Location:** Canada
* **Competition Method:** Competitive Open Bidding
* **Evaluation Criteria:** Lowest Price per Point
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contact Information**
If you require additional information regarding this tender announcement, please do not hesitate to contact Dominic Carrière at dominic.carriere@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. For technical support with SAP Ariba, please contact the CanadaBuys Service Desk agents at the link provided. 

### Links and Resources
* Adobe Acrobat is required to view and print correspondence via the CanadaBuys website.
* For more information on CanadaBuys, please visit the [CanadaBuys Getting Started page](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/getting-started). 
* For technical support with SAP Ariba, please [contact CanadaBuys Service Desk agents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/contact-support). 
* [Ariba website](https://www.ariba.com/en/) 

### Bidding Process
Please note that you are responsible for obtaining your own transportation and accommodations if required for tender evaluation
